description: Hidden Creek Estates offers this almost 1300 sq ft 3 bdrm, 2 bthrm home in a great family friendly complex. Great floor plan with large windows making it super bright. Kitchen has newer S/S appliances and peninsula seating for 2. Sliders lead to the well sized fenced yard, with storage shed, patio and grassed area ~ great for pets, kids. Head up to the 3 large bedrooms and a 4 pc main bath. Some updates include new hot water tank, paint, upgraded windows & roof ( 2018) & more! Parking for 2 (1 covered) & convenient storage off stall. Located in a quiet part of west Maple Ridge with all amenities, schools, parks, shopping within walking distance! Quick access to Golden Ears and the West Coast Express for commuters.
